website_summaries.verdict: A compact greenhouse is perfect for the gardener who doesn't have much space.
pros: This affordable mini green house features 4 shelves that are connected to a metal frame
It is easy to assemble and the roll-up zippered door provides quick access to all of your plants
cons: Be sure to secure the unit so it doesn't topple and be aware of the shelve's weight limits so you don't overload the structure

customer_reviews.title: Grow Plants when you live in Zone 5 (aka plant hell)
customer_reviews.text: My plants &seeds love this. Illinois is either Iceland or 8th level of Hell. This is perfect for seedlings... make sure you get the Lights & Seedling Mats! I also Root Roses in this (I use a... nope not giving that LOL)
customer_reviews.author: MOM_2MANY

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the Gardman greenhouse products. This is my second Gardman mini greenhouse (I purchased another model but thought this was the same). This model is just as good as my other and is standing right next to it. Great for my seedlings and young plants that are not ready to go in the ground. The zipper feature is great as during cold nights especially if you put the unit near your drying machine vent. The unit is very sturdy withstanding some extreme South Texas winds. I've had the unit since February and it's ready to last me into the next growing season. I will definitely add a few more units to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Dead easy to put together, works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 5 minutes and no tools to assemble this thing. Based on previous reviews mentioning racks becoming dislodged when moving plants, I took an extra minute to put one tiny zip tie around each center support to keep the wire racks in place, and have not had any problems. It worked great for starting all my tomato and pepper seedlings, and I'll be ordering another one for my bean starts. The cover also removes easily if you don't need the extra heat and humidity, making for great outdoor plant shelves for hardening or display. Worth every penny and more.
customer_reviews.author: Ruebette

customer_reviews.title: This greenhouse worked awesome. I only used it for one spring so ...
customer_reviews.text: This greenhouse worked awesome. I only used it for one spring so far. I did have a problem with some of the rods not fitting correctly, but we worked it out. It is kind of flimsy if you don't have it tied down. We kept ours right next to our shop out of the wind. It kept my plants protected and warm inside - especially when the sun came out. I'm thinking about buying a bigger one though as this was just right and I want to start some additional seedlings this year. :) Update: This was my third year using this greenhouse and it still is in excellent condition. Easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: such a handy little greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: great little starter greenhouse. I got this to start my seedlings in the spring for the garden and put it in the south facing window of my living room. it did its job fine as it retained moisture and warmth for the seedlings. but afterwards I decided to put my orchids in it during the summer to keep them humid and it was really helpful to protect them when the A.C. was in continuous use. because of the green threads in this heavier version of mini green house, kept the sun from burning and sensitive leaves on both my seed starts and later on my orchids.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to start my vegetable garden from seeds this year. I assembled it easily and it can hold up to 2 trays (11"x21") on each shelf. I now plan to keep an herb garden in it after my vegetables are planted. I keep it in our all seasons porch so it's not outside and I don't have to worry about it being blown over by the wind. It would definitely need to be staked down in windy areas to prevent falling over.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Works great - be sure to attach shelves
customer_reviews.text: This little greenhouse is used in my basement in winter. I use a heating mat (under the trays) and a grow light. I've successfully grown lettuce, cilantro and other herbs this winter. I also am using it to start my seeds for transplantation on the shelves below. The seeds have all sprouted and seem to be doing fine. As other reviewers state, be sure to attach the shelves so that they do not flip over. (I dumped my trays twice while waiting for zip ties.) Happy gardening!
customer_reviews.author: Thinking about it

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself $18 and purchase the 4 tier Greenhouse on Amazon also.  They are the same.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with Greenhouse, bought another 4-tier Greenhouse on Amazon also for $18.00 less. They are the same.
customer_reviews.author: cgstatenj

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews on this greenhouse so I had the tips from others about using ties to hold the trays to the frame. This took me less than 1/2 hour to put together. It is sturdy and well made in my opinion. The cover is nice weight and looks durable. It is heavy clear plastic with a green weave mesh in it. I expect it will last for several years. It is a great unit for the price. I added a heating matt and have a 150 watt grow light to install. My seeds started to germinate in 3 days. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Lots of these to pick from. This one is pretty well made. The vinyl cover is quite sturdy and thicker than many other choices out there. I bit more light filtering than some but a good solution for a mini greenhouse
customer_reviews.author: Richard Parker

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This was fun to assemble. I put a large ceramic 14" pot on the bottom shelf with one big tomato plant, left out the two middle shelves, and put 6" pots on the top shelf for misc cucumbers and flowers. I used the two extra shelves to double the two shelves I did use for added strength. Filled this way, it doesn't seem the least bit unstable. I have never put the cover on, and probably never will this season. Perhaps if I want an early start next season I'll get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Defective and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: bars dont stay in place . Avoid problems- bars dont stay in place- got cut. shelves bent- RUN! now I have to go through the whole return process
customer_reviews.author: LOULOU

customer_reviews.title: Get a head start on your veggies
customer_reviews.text: This Mini Greenhouse has met my expectations for the price. Assembled easily, and used zip ties that previous buyers recommended for the shelves. Secured it to the deck railing and have had no problems with the wind. Use it for seed propagation, and seedlings to get a head start on spring before planting in the garden. Plan on using it earlier next year for the cool weather vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: WenJo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I brought this greenhouse to replace another one who's plastic covering ripped over the winter. I like this greenhouse's cover which is "filtered" and seems stronger than just a clear plastic cover. Although the shelves easily lift off the base but if you tie it down with twist ties then that issue is resolved. I also like the height that's not too high and the shelve space is just right.
customer_reviews.author: peggyb

customer_reviews.title: greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: this is great! i am trying to grow pumpkins, but the ones i planted in the ground were promptly eaten by bugs, because of the extremely dry conditions we have been having. i started seeds and put them in the greenhouse and they are doing well!! the greenhouse was extremely easy to put together and i bought tent stakes to stake it in the ground, as we have been having extreme winds here at the beach. i give this five stars for its ease of use, quickness of delivery and low cost.
customer_reviews.author: lelu & gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and have them set up on my Back porch. They are not heavy duty commercial grade but are perfect for the hobby gardener. After reading previous reviews i also used zip ties to secure the shelves, I recommend the seller add these into the packaging because without them your shelves are going to move around and not sit flat.
customer_reviews.author: Dayeonaira

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I found this greenhouse... 1. Easy to set up (even my 2 year old helped me) 2. Sturdy, at least for our mild California weather 3. Big and spacious Right now it's Winter, so my plants that were looking a bit sad are now living in the greenhouse and thriving. I'm excited to start some seedlings in there in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Boom Boom

customer_reviews.title: ... cheap one and I use it one season and LOVED it. Got myself a better quality one with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one myself that was a real cheap one and I use it one season and LOVED it. Got myself a better quality one with a spare plastic cover. Had my first success at growing bell peppers, I am sold on the green house.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but poorly built.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, I loved it! It was easy to assemble and contrary to other things I have read, the frame was extremely sturdy. However, my joy soon turned to disappointment as soon as I removed the shelves from the box. The wire shelves can be described in one word, CRAP!! The shelves are flimsy, do not lay flat, and poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffybear

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It love this thing! It's perfect for the price and I think the quality is just fine and should last a few years no prob. The material seems sturdy and the zippers work great. Overall, I'm happy with it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Field

customer_reviews.title: Good for veggie starts in flats for home garden needs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, perfect size for my limited needs and space. At this point the quality is equal to the price I paid. Thats a good thing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Laivo

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with it when I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with it when I purchased it. It assembles easily and is sturdy enough to support a reasonable amount of weight. Unfortunately the lightness also makes it easy to blow over. It has some rings on the back that can be used to anchor is to a wall/post, but unfortunately they're relatively weak. Despite being anchored one of the rings on mine broke and the entire greenhouse blew over. It was light because it was housing on seedlings, so I lost them all. Great indoor greenhouse, kinda meh outdoor one without additional setup.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hamsley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and easy to move around and stays together very good!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and strong standing but the shelf’s only hold about a 30 pound plant for each shelf but that’s really pushing it unless the weight is spread out between a few plants. The cover is great and easy to put over the frame. Very good for a small light weight greenhouse!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great little greenhouse.
customer_reviews.text: so far she loves it. It went together so fast and easy. Zip tied the shelves down, all should be good. It has tie downs in the back to help secure it from the wind. Can't wait for spring so we can put it to good use
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: I really really love this little greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this little greenhouse! It is perfect for my indoor herb garden! I live in Boston, MA and in the winter, nothing survives! Now, I have this handy house to keep my plants happy, warm and moist! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Maya Calico

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, some durability concerns.
customer_reviews.text: A couple mm of added thickness to the plastic support frame and stiffer metal shelves and this would be a five-star product. The shelf is really nice, but I'm concerned about it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: ThrowinStacks

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Look, I'm sure there are many better quality products on the market. However, this is perfect for my rooftop patio garden and the price was awesome. I heeded some of the warnings that its flimsy frame makes it prone to blowing over. I remedied this by weighing it down on the bottom shelf with a couple of bags of potting soil. Worked like a charm. My tomato seedlings exploded in this bad boy. I'm entirely satisfied. Only time will tell how the covering holds up, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennitron

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved this gift and is still holding up Great a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved this gift and is still holding up Great a year later. Able to start seeds inside much earlier
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: I like these however the plastic connecting pieces crack way to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these however the plastic connecting pieces crack way to easily. We bought two of these and upon set up both of the bottom connectors cracked. I had to use duck tape to keep it together. Other than that they are pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Almgren

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Description is accurate, got what I expected. Zip tied the shelves down right away like other reviewers suggested. No issues. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my new greenhouse! It took less than ten minutes to put together, it is roomy, sturdy, and the reinforced cover is very strong and flexible.It even has cloth ties inside to secure the cover to the frame. Best of all, it doesn't have that sickening new PVC smell. The parts snap together, so I will be able to break it down for winter storage. When it eventually wears out, the plastic brackets are #5 recyclable- although I think it should last a long time before I have to think about that.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on different greenhouses, they all said they are flimsy. I ordered this one anyway, and followed the advice of a couple of people that left reviews. I used a rubber mallet and bought the cable ties. I suggest if you buy one to do the same. It is a good size and I have 8 trays of veggies and flowers in this house. I am using this inside to start all my plants, once ready to go outside the cover will come off and can be used on my porch to hold flower pots.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: The wire racks are very weak so beware about placing pots on it. The frame is not very solid. The only good thing I like about it, is the cover over the frame is of a nice quality although the zippers quality may be questionable
customer_reviews.author: Marie T

customer_reviews.title: terribly made
customer_reviews.text: The framing is part plastic which breaks upon building. It's a discontinued product so it's all a waste of time. Great idea, poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: ImageryProductions

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sprouting plants warm and moist
customer_reviews.text: Placed on screened lanai. Very easy to assemble. Since it's under lanai, I don't have the concern of flying away or falling over from it's light weight. Although I store clay pots and potting supplies on the bottom shelf so that helps to weigh it down. The shelves move around a bit but can be secured with zip ties or bread ties. Inside stays very warm and humid.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Powell

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, they are perfect, what would make them excellent is if you could just purchase the plastic cover as a separate item. It will crack and break after a few years.
customer_reviews.author: jboll33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. It was extremely easy to put together. Nothing fell apart and it's been outside through many storms. The plastic still looks new, too.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my orchids and violets happy. Can't wait for herb season to fill it ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeping my orchids and violets happy. Can't wait for herb season to fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: mini greenhouse.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the cover is better on this one than my previous one. I put all my fertilizers sprays and small garden tools in it on my patio
customer_reviews.author: jane in spokane

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimsy. Have to tie the shelves to keep them in place
customer_reviews.author: GENEVRA FIELD

customer_reviews.title: ... long to put together but it's definitely not a sturdy frame. It toppled over on the first day
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take too long to put together but it's definitely not a sturdy frame. It toppled over on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Annie G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This greenhouse is perfect for using indoors to start seedlings. Very impressed with how great it works! I may order another!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Greenhouse is Great
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is a great little greenhouse. Just what I needed. Better yet was the price. We did add the additional zip ties to help steady the shelves but I had read other reviews before I bought it so we had them ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I used zip ties t make the shelves more sturdy. Great quality. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany S.

customer_reviews.title: is a 2nd one . . .
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one so much that when the zipped started separating, I came looking for another one . . .
customer_reviews.author: Heart

customer_reviews.title: STURDY
customer_reviews.text: VERY STURDY FOR THE INEXPENSIVE PRICE. IT SURE LOOKS PRETTY, TOO. I'M USING IT ON THE INSIDE OF MY HOUSE WITH A GROW LIGHT TO GET MY SEEDLING STARTED EARY SPRING
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Item was easy to assemble and I'm very happy that I have somewhere to put my seedlings now!
customer_reviews.author: Whispers

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! Looks very nice. Only issue is the flimsy shelf racks but that can be fixed easily with zip ties
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband, he likes it. Very easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I use it as my indoor green house with two hydro-farm tube-lights and fan, no issues yet. I removed in between racks and kept only two shelves. Also I stick 2mm aluminum sheet on all of its wall for reflection of light.
customer_reviews.author: Ninad

customer_reviews.title: the product is ok, for the price I was ...
customer_reviews.text: the product is ok, for the price I was expecting more solid quality of the material, but i guess it is doing the job. the inside of the house is steaming up quickly from condensation so i am not sure how much sunlight gets through.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Stortz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something inexpensive to store all my seedlings on my patio and reduce clutter. I personally did not use zipties because my plants hold it down just fine and I have the greenhouse against a wall for wind protection. After I bought this I saw at Lowes for $5.00 cheaper. I would have purchased there but too late.
customer_reviews.author: adriana979

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build. Had no problem. Does need more reinforcement between shelving but frankly, I was pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my deck to grow my plants from seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Rips easy
customer_reviews.text: I award this product two stars due to how easy it rips near the door zippers. First time using it and there is already a 10 in tear along the top part of the zipper. Also, make sure to tie it down to something so it doesn't blow all over the yard. Regarding its\'s functionality as a greenhouse, it seems to be doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product! I gave 4 stars cuz I wish It's all made of metal and not plastic. I put my herbs on top and orchids at the bottom I hope it will bloom again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Gardman 7610 4-Tier Mini Greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: This green house is the best garden item I own. It is the perfect size for my needs. It can't get any better. A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Skellenger

customer_reviews.title: Have to say I wasted my money and lost a lot of my plants
customer_reviews.text: This is not a greenhouse in my opinion. It lets barely any sunlight in, which nearly killed all of my plants. The shade is too dark. I was looking for a transition home for my seedlings when they were about ready to be transplanted, but needed to be hardened off first. Have to say I wasted my money and lost a lot of my plants.
customer_reviews.author: Torrie B.

customer_reviews.title: Son-in-love has not set it up yet but is quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Son-in-love has not set it up yet but is quite excited to use it. Do read the reviews about the zip ties for the shelves to help guard against wind.
customer_reviews.author: GabbieDeb

customer_reviews.title: Berry Easy to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was easy enough. But in order to grow tomatoes on the bottom shelf I will have to remove the front bracket on the second shelf pretty soon and that might be difficult. The plastic cover seem to be fairly strong enough think the unit to last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Rolf

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems to be too small to fit properly around the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. Very sturdy. Has lots of space for a small green house at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne York

customer_reviews.title: Good little greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: I love this little greenhouse. It is keeping about 20 degrees warmer than ambient temperatures. It is not strong enough to have in an open setting, but is perfect against the wall of my back porch.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Theriot

customer_reviews.title: Gardener aid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the backyard gardener. Protects young plants from the wind and birds.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Conover

customer_reviews.title: Item Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: Be careful assembling this product. The plastic cross members break easily. This mini greenhouse is a nice concept, but quality of some components is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B

customer_reviews.title: Nice greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed on my small porch to keep my plants safe when the weather gets down to freezing. A rubber mallet helped immensely when putting it together, as the poles must be tapped in to make it strong.
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: I will Buy more Mini Greenhouses
customer_reviews.text: Good design I like the upgrade from the one I already am using.The colored plastic and the angle in the top with the wire was a good change.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R Carta Sr

customer_reviews.title: works well but..
customer_reviews.text: it really needs to be staked or tied down. The first day had it out the wind came and flipped it. I lost a houseplant. then a few days later I saw a very similar green house in tractor supply for 20 dollars. I guess not staking it down was my fault, but when i tried to secure it one of the plastic material hoops ripped off. It really could be of better quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kkonya

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together, well made, no issues. Ready for my new plants that the birds can't get !
customer_reviews.author: C. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs
customer_reviews.text: Greenhouse was as described. It was large enough for my needs. Shelves are adjustable to accommodate large flower pots. Plan on using it for my flats
customer_reviews.author: John D

product_meta.title: Gardman USA 7610 Mini 4 Tier Greenhouse
product_meta.description: Gardman 7610 4-Tier Greenhouse with Reinforced Cover. Give your seeds, seedlings, and young plants an early start in this sturdy greenhouse. Ideal for small backyards or homes where space is an issue; place on a deck, patio, or balcony. Quality construction and materials to last many seasons. Four 18" deep shelves for pots and seed trays. Strong powder-coated tubular steel frame with simple push-fit assembly that requires no tools. Heavy duty reinforced polyethylene cover and roll-up zippered door for easy access. Includes guy ropes, and metal stakes for extra stability against high winds. Easy to follow assembly instructions. Dimensions: 18" Long x 27" Wide x 63" High. **Replacement cover for this greenhouse is Gardman item #R687SC (sold separately). Gardman "Bring your garden to life"
feature_bullets: 2 feet 3-inch long by 1 foot 6-inch deep by 5 feet 3-inch high
Quality construction and materials to last many seasons
Quality construction and materials to last many seasons
Roll-up zippered door for easy access
Strong push fit tubular steel frame assembles in minutes without any tools

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars116 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
